title: The Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/5/22
itunes:title: The Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/5/22
description:
George Noory and author Roger Straughan discuss his evidence for life after death, how world religions have tried to cover up proof of the afterlife for control, and if ancient civilizations had a better understanding of death than modern society.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
